Name: Vascobelo
Review Text: Addicted to this place. Hands down the best coffee in Amsterdam. The staff is always super friendly and well versed in how to put together the perfect espresso + milk alternatives, whereas other cafes often mess up the new age dairies. Just wish they'd offer 0% milk and I'd be here even more often!

Name: Vascobelo
Review Text: Great place to enjoy the sun on the terrace. The carrot cake was very tasty.

Name: Vascobelo
Review Text:

Review Text: It‚Äôs a really nice coffee chain unfortunately this location is bad due to their staff - we sat outside, waited 10mins for someone to come, then went inside to ask if we can order and told by the waiter to wait for her to come out. 15 mins later we left.

Name: Vascobelo
Review Text: It was so fast that I couldn't catch the carrot cake before eating. One of the best carrot cake I have ever eat, surrounded by finest Belgium white chocolate. Their latte machiato is also very good. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vascobelo
